snippet: Angélica Moreno is celebrated in Mexico for being the first to market a form of this region’s traditional handmade Talavera pottery that features contemporary high-end design.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Angelica Moreno, entrepreneur who is celebrated in Mexico for being the first to widely market the region's traditional handmade Talavera pottery that features contemporary high-end design. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: CHOLULA, Mexico BROKEN plates in bright colors form a teardrop below a window of Angélica Moreno's pottery studio. Broken dishes -- little half-moons and smiles -- also decorate stairs, and poke out from a tiled wall, with an amoeba-shaped window reminiscent of Gaudí.

headline.main: An Entrepreneur at the Vanguard of Pottery
